title: No proof of income, no credit, I will move you in right now, call me°°
posting_body: ['WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM EASY TO  QUALIFY!', 'Quick move in.', 'If you are an independent worker have low credit or background issues and have problems finding a place to settle with your family, do not hesitate call me or TEXT me, I am a rental expert in South Florida, I will find a property for you and get you approved.', 'WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM with credit score of over 550, we will buy any property CASH for you  up tp $600,000 and then rent it to you for 1 to 3 years until you can get ready to purchase it, it will save some of your rent money towards the purchase ( about 25% of payment).', 'BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT IN THE BEST BUILDING IN THE AREA OF SAWGRASS, PLANTATION AND SUNRISE, NICE AND AMPLIUS KITCHEN WITH LOTS OF CABINETS AND DRAWERS, S/S APPLIANCES, GRANITE COUNTERTOPS, WINDOWS SHADES AND BLACKOUT AT THE BEDROOMS, TILE FLOORS IN SOCIAL AREA + DEN.', 'CALL ME OR TEXT ME', 'I RESPOND INMIDIATELLY!!', 'show contact info', ')', '""EASY SOLUTIONS REALTY LLC ""']
